Example: Type any R code in the chunk, for example:
```{r}
mycars <- within(mtcars, { cyl <- ordered(cyl) })
mycars
```

There are vectors and matrices that can be used, but they require to have only one data type.
Thus, the preferred object to use in data science is a data frame as it allows the use of multiple data types on the same object.
